title: 'Use this Shampoo (Khadi Herbal Natural) if want Bald head'
body: This is my honest review written after three weeks of use (three times a week). Before using this shampoo I had no hair fall or damage ( I have pure virgin coconut oil). Once started to use this shampoo hair fall became very severe and day by day it increased (initially I thought using this for at least two months consistently will give a better result but it doesn't ). While hair washing this shampoo wipes the hair very highly. Even after being washed with water, hair can be removed with a towel ( Pathetic and such bad experience) Be careful with this product. I never recommend selling this kind of product on Amazon.
